description: Werner’s Fine Sausages has been winning over the foodies of Mission, Kansas with their handcrafted, made from scratch sausages at their storefront since 1973. And now you can also find Werner’s wonderfully succulent selection out on the streets or at an event near you. Their mobile menu includes local favorites, like their signature Derbetrunken Käse-coarse-grind bratwurst made with beer buds and cheddar cheese, smoked, and comes on pretzel bun with pale ale beer mustard. They're also serving up wonderful creations like the Mac Attack- Knackwurst with garlic, bacon & beer mac n’ cheese, and potato chip garnish, the Ragin’ Cajun- Andouille with cajun creole and topped coleslaw. And there’s so much more!So be sure to wander on over to Werner’s on Wheels (or have them make their way to you) and start dining on some really awesome sausages soon!
name: Werner's On Wheels
